comment: Absolutely stunning resort with breathtaking ocean views. The staff was incredibly friendly and the amenities were top-notch. Perfect for a romantic getaway!
Great location and beautiful rooms. The pool area is fantastic. Only minor issue was the WiFi speed, but overall excellent stay.
Lovely beachfront location with easy access to dive shops. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Great value for money!
Perfect for divers! Close to all the dive sites and very affordable. The bungalows are basic but clean and comfortable.
Amazing seafood and Thai cuisine! The ocean view while dining is incredible. Service was excellent and prices are reasonable.
Professional dive center with excellent instructors. Equipment is well-maintained and the staff is very knowledgeable. Highly recommend!
Cozy caf√© with great coffee and smoothies. Perfect spot for breakfast or a light lunch. The atmosphere is very relaxing.
Luxury at its finest! Private beach access, stunning villa, and impeccable service. Worth every penny for a special occasion.
